company.name: Zoho CRM
company.one_liner: Zoho CRM is a cloud-based customer relationship management system that helps businesses manage leads, deals, automation, and customer interactions.

pricing_summary.overview: Zoho CRM offers a Free Edition and multiple paid tiers including Standard, Professional, Enterprise, and Ultimate.
pricing_summary.note: Pricing varies by region. Paid plans add more automation, analytics, customization, and platform capabilities.

faqs.a: Zoho CRM helps businesses manage leads, contacts, deals, emails, tasks, automation, workflows, and sales reporting from one place.
Zoho CRM is suitable for small businesses, mid-sized companies, and enterprise sales teams who want better pipeline visibility and customer engagement.

faqs.q: Do you have a free plan?
faqs.a: Yes. Zoho CRM offers a Free Edition for up to three users with basic lead, contact, and deal management.
Zoho CRM has tiered pricing: Free, Standard, Professional, Enterprise, and Ultimate. Each tier adds more automation, analytics, customization, and omnichannel features.

faqs.q: Tell me about the Standard plan.
faqs.a: The Standard plan adds scoring rules, email insights, workflows, custom fields, and dashboards compared to the Free Edition.

faqs.q: Tell me about the Professional plan.
faqs.a: The Professional plan includes full inventory management, advanced automation, macros, and validation rules.

faqs.q: Tell me about the Enterprise plan.
faqs.a: The Enterprise plan includes multi-user portals, advanced customization, canvas design, predictive analytics, and Zia AI features.

faqs.q: Tell me about the Ultimate plan.
faqs.a: The Ultimate plan includes advanced analytics, higher data limits, premium support, and additional business intelligence features.

faqs.q: Is Zoho CRM good for small teams?
faqs.a: Yes. The Free and Standard plans work well for small teams starting with CRM and scaling their sales process.

faqs.q: Does Zoho CRM support mobile apps?
faqs.a: Yes. Zoho CRM has mobile apps for Android and iOS for managing leads, calls, and tasks on the go.

faqs.q: Can Zoho CRM help with email?
faqs.a: Yes. Zoho CRM supports email integration, templates, email insights, open-rate tracking, and bulk email features in higher plans.

faqs.q: Does Zoho CRM support omnichannel communication?
faqs.a: Yes. Zoho CRM supports email, phone, live chat, social media, and web forms in selected plans.
